div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 201 Epirus, before 1825 (395) Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 150+ AR drs. of Corinth ("more than half"), Am- bracia, Dyrrhachium, Corcyra, Acar- nania, Anactorium, Leucas and unc. mints Disposition: Cousinéry Cousinéry, Les monnaies d' argent de la ligue Achéenne (Paris, 1825), pp. 72 ff., line drawings
